alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 15 at 3:41AM HST until December 15 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR THE NORTH AND EAST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI LANAI AND BIG ISLAND... .A large north swell (350 degree) will peak today at advisory levels along north and east facing shores, then gradually lower tonight and Saturday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf 15 to 20 feet along north facing shores. Surf 8 to 12 feet along east facing shores. * WHERE...North and east facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, Lanai, Maui, and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
